mutants.code:
def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split()
    split_index = len(words) / 2
    second_half = words[split_index:]
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in second_half]
    output = ','.join(reversed_words)
    return output

    output = ','.join(reversed_words)
    return output

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split()
    split_index = len(words) // 2
    second_half = words[split_index:]
    reversed_words = [word[::--1] for word in second_half]
    output = ','.join(reversed_words)
    return output
